short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xeli is a AI code review assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xeli is a smart code review assistant that saves developers time by automating repetitive tasks, identifying issues, and offering improvements. It quickly flags common errors, security risks, and coding standard violations, ensuring the code is clean, secure, and production-ready.
